009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFit3Points;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitHyperSimple;
016
017/**
018 * <p>
019 * RANSAC detector for circles. See Sec. 12.1.4 of [1] for additional
020 * details.
021 * </p>
022 * <p>
023 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
024 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
025 * </p>
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 * @version 2022/11/19
029 * 
030 * @see GeometricCircle
031 * @see RansacDetector
032 */
033public class RansacCircleDetector extends RansacDetector<GeometricCircle>{
034        
035        /**
036         * Nested class extending {@link RansacDetector.RansacParameters} 
037         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
038         */
039        public static class Parameters extends RansacDetector.RansacParameters {
040                /**
041                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
042                 */
043                public Parameters() {
044                        this.randomPointDraws = 1000;
045                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
046                        this.minInlierCount = 70;
047                }
048        }
049        
050        // constructors ------------------------------------
051
052        /**
053         * Constructor using specific parameters.
054         * @param params RANSAC parameters
055         */
056        public RansacCircleDetector(Parameters params) {
057                super(3, params);
058        }
059        
060        /**
061         * Constructor using default parameters.
062         */
063        public RansacCircleDetector() {
064                this(new Parameters());
065        }
066        
067        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
068
069        @Override
070        GeometricCircle fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
071                CircleFitAlgebraic fit = new CircleFit3Points(points);
072                return fit.getGeometricCircle();
073        }
074        
075        @Override
076        GeometricCircle fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
077//              CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitPratt(inliers);  // TODO: fails, check why
078                CircleFitAlgebraic fit2 = new CircleFitHyperSimple(inliers);
079                if (fit2.getParameters() == null) 
080                        throw new RuntimeException("circle fitFinal() failed!");
081                return fit2.getGeometricCircle();
082        }
083}
